nodes.text: The Crypt of Martyrs was a burial site for martyrs that was located on the planet Lorrd.

The Crypt was located in Qatamer on Lorrd and was considered by the Lorrdians to be one of their most historically important sites. Lorrdians who had given their lives to fighting slavery had their bodies interred in the Crypt and each tomb had a small holoprojector, which played recordings of the dead. The Jemas brothers, the Kessel revolts, the Serter Market Rebellions and the Jedi Mari-Elan Nora all had memorials insided the Crypt.
In 0 ABY, the Human Tash Arranda visited the Crypt of Martyrs while on Lorrd and was eager to see the grave of Mari-Elan Nora.
